title: Smart Data Models - ExcST4B
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Modified IEEE ST4B static excitation system with maximum inner loop feedback gain .

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be ExcST4B

kc.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Rectifier loading factor proportional to commutating reactance (Kc). Typical Value = 0.113. Default: 0.0

kg.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Feedback gain constant of the inner loop field regulator (Kg). Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

ki.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Potential circuit gain coefficient (Ki).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

kim.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage regulator integral gain output (Kim).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

kir.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage regulator integral gain (Kir).  Typical Value = 10.75. Default: 0.0

kp.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Potential circuit gain coefficient (Kp).  Typical Value = 9.3. Default: 0.0

kpm.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage regulator proportional gain output (Kpm).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

kpr.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage regulator proportional gain (Kpr).  Typical Value = 10.75. Default: 0.0

lvgate.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Selector (LVgate). true = LVgate is part of the block diagram false = LVgate is not part of the block diagram.  Typical Value = false. Default: False

ta.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage regulator time constant (Ta).  Typical Value = 0.02. Default: 0

thetap.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Potential circuit phase angle (thetap).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

uel.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Selector (Uel). true = UEL is part of block diagram false = UEL is not part of block diagram.  Typical Value = false. Default: False

vbmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum excitation voltage (Vbmax).  Typical Value = 11.63. Default: 0.0

vgmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum inner loop feedback voltage (Vgmax).  Typical Value = 5.8. Default: 0.0

vmmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum inner loop output (Vmmax).  Typical Value = 99. Default: 0.0

vmmin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum inner loop output (Vmmin).  Typical Value = -99. Default: 0.0

vrmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum voltage regulator output (Vrmax).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

vrmin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum voltage regulator output (Vrmin).  Typical Value = -0.87. Default: 0.0

xl.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Reactance associated with potential source (Xl).  Typical Value = 0.124. Default: 0.0
